title: Eight of 10 people with cancer risk genes don't know it

title_detail.value: Eight of 10 people with cancer risk genes don't know it

summary: Genomic screening shows that more than 80 percent of those who carry an identifiable genetic risk for breast, ovarian, prostate, and pancreatic cancer don't know it.

summary_detail.value: Genomic screening shows that more than 80 percent of those who carry an identifiable genetic risk for breast, ovarian, prostate, and pancreatic cancer don't know it.
